posts.post_title: Wanted OJ John Ward Portrait - got it!
posts.post_content:
Looking for an OJ John Ward portrait card - I see this pose for sale fairly often but I am looking for an example with a very strong image, such as this one below.

If you have one with an image like this - or this example! - please PM me.

Found a beauty! Thanks Jay
